products.title: Hopsack Wicker Roman Blind
products.description: Their rustic hopsack range offers you a natural textured fabric which combines tradition with a contemporary feel. This classic cream roman blind has an attractive textured finish and will fit in well in most rooms due to the neutral tone of the fabric. Product id: db-rom0691 fabric colour: wicker material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Moondust Parchment Cream Roman Blind
products.description: The moondust parchment cream roman blind will subtly enhance and define the look of any space. The gorgeous pattern in cream has a laid-back luxurious look that when teamed with the decorative folding design will bring a soft and classic finish to so many spaces. Whether traditional or contemporary, bedroom or living space, this versatile design is an appealing option. products.title: Banbury Parchment Mink Roman Blind
products.description: Tie together a modern scheme with this smart window blind. The banbury parchment mink roman blind will provide practical shading at your windows and is sleek and easy to open and close using the sidewinder chain. This design features a striking geometric pattern in a warm grey colourway that will suit a range of neutral and contemporary interior schemes. Product id: db-rom1049 fabric colour: parchment mink material: 78% polyester 14% cotton 8% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.
